trans-unit.source: Represents a property stored in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una proprietà archiviata in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> represents properties in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> such as the (x, y) coordinates, pressure, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> rappresenta le proprietà in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> come (x, y) coordinate, pressione e così via.

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> class to customize the information stored for each property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ereditare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> classe per personalizzare le informazioni archiviate per ogni proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Presentation Framework ships with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> and specifies the minimum and maximum values, resolution, and unit used for each property.
trans-unit.target: Windows Presentation Framework viene fornito con il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> classe che eredita da <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> e specifica i valori minimo e massimo, risoluzione e l'unità utilizzata per ogni proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> object from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creata la <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> dell'oggetto da un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> e ottiene le informazioni per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> to copy.
trans-unit.target: La <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> da copiare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> class, copying the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> copiando l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> che identifica in modo univoco <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the property represents a button on the stylus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per indicare che la proprietà rappresenta un pulsante sullo stilo; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> class using the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> tramite l'utilizzo del GUID specificato.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il GUID per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The GUID for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: GUID per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creata la <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> da un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> e ottiene le informazioni per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> represents a button on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Indica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> rappresenta un pulsante sullo stilo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> represents a button on the stylus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> rappresenta un pulsante sullo stilo; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> object from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creata la <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> dell'oggetto da un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> e ottiene le informazioni per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente.
